## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (2c08f5b5aead255b40db040ee2c93ce2f49f95372685ee1ba4cec89f21fd4e77)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cloud-functions-schedule-instance' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
